text: Porridge is good as usual, but come on serving cold Sambal La La that is a chef's recommendation? Bruh.

Had visited this shop many times with family. Had been very pleasant until our very last visit.. The PRC lady taking our order had been very pushy. Despite ordering total of 10 frogs with 2 pot or porridge for a family with two little girls, she was pushing us very hard to order additional veg dish despite our rejection. She even told us she need to meet her target to sell veg dishes to customers....
Come on.. even if you like to make more sales, you must also consider if your customers are able to finish the food right?

Pushy lady waitressâ€¦ outdated method of customer service. keep promoting and pushing to order for more even for a single diner. Hidden cost and no chance to read the menu properly and slowly. Food is very so so especially the bakuteh. Over priced. Not trust worthy

Their kung bao frog is very tasty and service was fast. Better service than the infamous one at geylang lor 3.  Can try some of their zichar dishes which are nice too. I tried their fried pork intestines previously.

Only bad thing is that it's hard to get seats during peak hours.
I am amazed. I have been in SG for a couple of years. This bull frog clay pot restaurant is the best that I have tried in Singapore
